website_summaries.verdict: This set of building blocks is made from foam, to make them  a perfect choice for toddlers, but still useful and fun enough to capture the attention of older kids.
pros: Do not hurt or tend to break things if thrown
Blocks are of a standard size
Firm enough for good building, but soft enough not to hurt anyone while  they are "under construction
cons: It can be a bit of a challenge to get all the blocks back into the storage bag that comes with this set

customer_reviews.title: Pictures and title misleading - not giants
customer_reviews.text: They seem of decent quality but the title and pictures are misleading: These are not giant. I expected these to be much larger. The actual dimensions are in the description but title and pictures are clearly designed to fool people into thinking these are mini-human size.
customer_reviews.author: Marty G

customer_reviews.title: Giant? Let's check the dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: The only one picture in the product description that shows the block's size of 4" does not match the real product. The shortest side of every block is about 2.5", as shown on the picture side-by-side. Some of the blocks are up to 9" long. However, our "end users" don't care about all these details, - they like the set.
customer_reviews.author: g-father

customer_reviews.title: So like other reviewers I purchased these thinking they would be ...
customer_reviews.text: So like other reviewers I purchased these thinking they would be a good size and a great price. They are all of those things but the title "giant" is very misleading. I didn't notice until after I purchased that they are normal sized blocks per other reviews. Kept purchase, happy with purchase, just not as advertised. They are popular with my 16 month old son, my 3 year old niece, my 8 year old step son.... everyone wants a piece of them. I did purchase ecr4 softzone blocks to get a larger size I was after. In picture you see my normal Melissa and Doug wooden blocks mixed with these and they are about the same size.
customer_reviews.author: H. HunTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: We love these blocks! My 3 and 4 year old build with them all the time.. indoor and outdoor use. We may have to get more to build even higher!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: This product brought the fun I anticipated it would
customer_reviews.text: This product brought the fun I anticipated it would! Two rambunctious boys love setting these up as towers, buildings, etc and letting their oversized dragon and ogre toys knock them down. They also build settings for other toys, for example a bridge for Spiderman to swing off of, and a rescue site for their Paw patrol characters.The pieces are nearly evenly divided, so if they are in me/my mode (thankfully rare) each can build his own duplicate structure. The best part is they are SOFT, so no injuries to themselves or damage to the walls, furniture, etc. It arrived on time and nicely/appealingly packaged. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: FavoriteAunt

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them. Especially good for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Got for my grand neices and nephew. Kids love them. Especially good for toddlers.. when things start flying..nobody gets hurt..Best to get a box and store them lose then try to repackage them into the carrying case it came in. It's a riddle all unto itself on how to get them all perfectly back to that rectangular shape. Also - they aren't 'giant' but they are sized appropriately for kids. Think old school wooden blocks but in colorful foam.
customer_reviews.author: diane a.

customer_reviews.title: nice product all around but I was hoping for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking this was a oversized large set that would be taller than my 5 year old...it is more on the size of my 1 year old..nice product all around but I was hoping for a set that was big enough to build fort my kids could sit in almost like a treehouse style building blocks
customer_reviews.author: TotalAmazP

customer_reviews.title: NOT in any way “giant.”
customer_reviews.text: My toddler does love these blocks. The single star is for the blatant lie in the listing. The image showing 4” cubes is a total fabrication to make you think these blocks are bigger than they are. The only cubes in the set are 2” on a side. Comparing that to the relative size of the rest of the blocks it’s clear the seller is misrepresenting the product in an attempt to justify the price. Had my daughter not been in the room and super excited when the package arrived, I would have sent them right back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Medium sized fun dynamic blocks
customer_reviews.text: My kids really enjoy playing with these blocks. They are medium sized and the smallest pieces are large enough that my 6 month old won't choke on them, but can still play along with my 2 year old. They fit back into the bag nicely and many different ways. The colors are bright and my kid enjoys organizing them by color in addition to seeing how high they can build. The different shapes make them dynamic. Kids can make ramps for cars or to roll the cylindrical blocks down. The price could be a bit lower for the amount of blocks you get, but still a great value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to talk about the size of the toy, coz before I buy it I know it will not be giant. However, It has strong chemical smell which gives me headache. After I got it I put all the blocks outside. It is five days now. The bad smell is still there. Besides that, the quality of the product is also bad (U can c it from my pictures). If after ten days the smell is still there, I may thinking to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Xi

customer_reviews.title: Nice learning blocks
customer_reviews.text: Nice blocks for toddlers. Their foam so not a easy to hurt themselves with if they topple over on them. However, they're foam. Watch out of they get bit. My 19 month old left a sizable bite mark on one of the blocks. The case to keep them in was nice for like a day, then the zipper broke and that went out the window real fast. As far as sturdiness goes, its foam. Its not extremely sturdy but its not that bendable either.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Big not giant but not small either (cut unevenly)
customer_reviews.text: The size of the blocks are amazing. They are not giant but they are not small either. Some are big and some are the size of regular blocks. A perfect mix in size but some just a few but enough are cut uneven making them hard to stack to build something which is the purpose of the blocks. My son was trying to stack them but they wouldn't stay. I was very disappointed my 2 year old son even more when I put in the box to return them now ordering the regular size ones. What a shame. He was so excited when I opened the box!
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: soft blocks for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: 11 month old granddaughter loves them. Mostly she is knocking down whatever her dad builds, but it doesn't hurt; soft when she falls down; easier to develop fine motor skills in another couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great building blocks
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the purchase and The little one loves it. No smell when opened from the bag and the foam is pretty dense and not flimsy. One tiny complaint is that some pieces don’t have the ends leveled, specially the cylinder ones. Those seem to tip over and frustrate our already OCD two year old...
customer_reviews.author: Abdul A.

customer_reviews.title: Good shapes and large quantity, but much smaller in size than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 20 month old grandson. I had planned on adding these foam blocks to a set I already have, which are quite large, and I've been trying to find a duplicate set. When I saw "giant" foam blocks in the description, I thought I had finally found what I was looking for. Unfortunately, that was not the case. While "some" of the blocks are larger, most are quite small and not something I would consider "giant". The quality of the blocks is good, just not the size I expected.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Fun. It far from giant
customer_reviews.text: We have similar blocks that we thought were the same size (given that these say “giant”) and we’re hoping to just add on but these are not giant. They are almost half the size of our other blocks. The colors are nice, the blocks are sturdy and there are more shapes than our other set. But this is much too much expensive given the size of the blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for a playroom
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I recently purchased these for my playroom. My kids are older and love these. The children I babysit enjoy these so much. They are a perfect size. Some of the other soft foam blocks on Amazon included tiny pieces. These are good for toddlers and up as there arent any tiny chocking hazard like pieces. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan DZ

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks but I thought they were larger
customer_reviews.text: Had a slight odor when opened but it has dissipated once they have been open for a while. I purchased these to go in a 9 month olds play area but it was a bad idea, it little teeth marks all over these foam blocks. But he can throw them and fall on them without any issues so we are keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: john laster

customer_reviews.title: Great open ended toy
customer_reviews.text: I prefer open ended toys like this that kids can use their imagination with. My two year old loves these blocks. They’re very sturdy and a good size, not huge but not small either. He’s been playing with these almost everyday for the last month. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: pnanda

customer_reviews.title: Minature blocks
customer_reviews.text: These are FAR from Giant Blocks - these are regular size building blocks, the picture is very decieving.
customer_reviews.author: vanderson

customer_reviews.title: It has a chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I have two concerns about this product 1. It smells some sort of chemicals which gives me headache, thus, might not be healthy for kids 2. They are not good cut, similar shapes have different dimensions which makes building difficult
customer_reviews.author: MaviJeans

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit with young kids
customer_reviews.text: These foam blocks are used in a commercial setting. They have proven themselves to be a huge hit with the kids. We have everywhere from babies clear up to four year olds playing with them. They're sturdy, but not too hard. The bright colorful shapes draw the children's attention and they can play with them for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Evans

customer_reviews.title: They are not giant
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they would b giant as the title states, but they're not. I was under the impression my toddler would need two hands to pick up, but they fit in one hand. They are nice, but by no means of the imagination are they giant.
customer_reviews.author: WhatABeautifulDay

customer_reviews.title: Decent sized and fun for kids.
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are great for kids. Our 2 year old loves to build 'houses' with them. They are a good size, not small but not what I would call giant. My only complaint is that some pieces aren't very square. In other words, if you stack them in a single tower some pieces will be tilted, which makes it harder to build larger towers. They seem like they will hold up to the abuse the kids give them.
customer_reviews.author: bltpyro

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my twin one year old grandsons. They are great for little hands and pretty durable, too (most of them have bite marks on them now, but that was to be expected)! And they can go into the tub with the boys at the end of the day so they don't get too grimy! Their 3 year old cousin loves building with them too, and we don't have to worry about blocks tumbling and hitting the babies because they are so light weight. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Lundy

customer_reviews.title: ... mastered returning them to the storage bag and I love watching my 1 year old play with them
customer_reviews.text: I've mastered returning them to the storage bag and I love watching my 1 year old play with them. She prefers knocking down anything I build with it, so I'm grateful for the soft foam. I like that the easy to clean texture and how they can substitute for bath toys when we travel and I want to limit the number of items we bring from home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice blocks. Not giant
customer_reviews.text: Granted, I should have read the reviews prior to purchasing. While these are larger than your average block...they are not giant. My kids really enjoy playing with them...and I needed some new stuff since we are stuck at home...so overall a win.
customer_reviews.author: jc mom

customer_reviews.title: Big fun!
customer_reviews.text: These a perfect. Large! Sturdy!Sure they come with less pieces but you can make more impressive, buildings. My kids absolutely love this. We make garages for a toy cars, zoos for are toy animals and so much more!
customer_reviews.author: centcent

customer_reviews.title: Fun to stack...even more fun to knock down!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even taken all of them out for my 18-month and she still has so much fun stacking them, trying put the cylinders into the holes, and most importantly knocking them down (after I made a beautiful castle with them lol). Great value for the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tamia Spells

customer_reviews.title: Good set, bad chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Great building block set, but even after having this set for a while now it still has a strong chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa Chaveriat

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a chritsmas gift. Recipient says it was in perfect condition and as expected except the box it came in was opened. Not sure how that came to be but nevertheless everything was great.
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are awesome! Bought for my 2-1/2 year old Grandson. He loves them and so does his 4 year old Sister. Not too small, not too big. The foam is very sturdy, I’m sure it would be difficult to damage. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Infant-Safe Blocks
customer_reviews.text: So far, my grandson is at the stage of knocking the blocks down, as well as biting down on them with his brand new teeth. Even with his tiny hands he is able to pick up the blocks because they are so light. I love that they are foam and he won’t get hurt with them. Eventually it will be fun watching him learn to build.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: BIG fun blocks!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson LOVED these blocks. I bought them as a birthday gift for him. His 1/2 year old sister and 4 year old brother loved them also. They are very lightweight, so if they are thrown or fall and hit a child, it isn't a problem, but they stack very well. I wasn't sure of the size from the description, but they are large, just as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: My children love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought two sets. And will purchase again as great gifts. for winter house bound play. I gave these as gifts for two nieces and two nephews. wide age range girls are 2 & 8, boys are 3 & 4. Both families loved them!! Children build with them, knock them down, throw them all in fun, no one gets hurt. Great indoor play!! Great for learning colors and shapes too!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks
customer_reviews.text: Cool foams blocks . My 1 year old niece loves them! Very sturdy I was worried she might be able to break a piece off ( as she is teething right now and eating everything lol) but it’s held up great !
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Great foam blocks of a good size. Not too small.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized foam building blocks. Be careful if you have a teething child or one that likes to chew on things. Slight chemical odor when you first open them. Recomend cleaning before letting children play.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: These blocks are the perfect size for babies to play with
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are the perfect size for babies to play with. I love that it comes with a zipper bag to store them in and keep them organized when they aren’t being played with. We love stacking them and knocking them down. The foam is great so if the blocks fall they don’t hurt my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Raymundo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these blocks for my 2 yr old grandson and they arrived in perfect condition and very quickly. These blocks are exactly as advertised and are made from a very dense foam that is very easy to stack, knock down, build, repeat and he is already getting loads of fun from them!! Of course he is only 2, but I will ask him to bring me a certain color block and he will, so this is very educational as well as fun to push Grammy's structure over!! Highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: SANDY

customer_reviews.title: Great size, color, and shapes.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase these blocks because previous reviewers were disappointed by the size. I am happy to say that these foam blocks are plenty big for my 2 year old! The colors are vibrant and the shapes are precisely cut. This set of blocks comes in a rectangular storage bag with a handle. Including photos in case anyone ever attempts to get them all back in the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Crisostomo

customer_reviews.title: Big blocks
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size with vibrant colors. My kids love using these. Some of the pieces were indented which is frustrating, but I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves these
customer_reviews.text: They are soft and very light weight, which i love because, i don't have to worry that my 3 year old will get hurt, and he loves playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: karmen haik

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 year old granddaughter. She loves stacking stuff and knocking it down. She can do this with these blocks with no chance of harm as they are very soft and light. They are a firm foam rubber type of material so they stack well too.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Building Blocks
customer_reviews.text: Our little one loved these blocks so much. Very easy to use and durable. Lost some stars because of price. The picture is a little misleading because you think you’re getting a lot of blocks. Nevertheless, our son loved it so much we bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Reza

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and I realized that these were not "giant" blocks. BUT they were also not what others have pictured either. They were maybe 1.5 inch, so small, cheaply made. Could have bought a better pack of blocks at Walmart for $10. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Alex James

customer_reviews.title: These are great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my one year old grandson who loves to bite chunks out of everything. He can't do that to these! They are great because they are hard enough to build, but soft enough to not hurt anyone or break anything when thrown.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves, loves, loves these...and I think loves more to knock them down. I like that they are not hard, so if you step on one no issues of breaking it or hurting one self. No shatps edges etc. Great item..
customer_reviews.author: Zon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: They are not that big
customer_reviews.text: Although my kids like them I thought for the price they would be bigger also with giant being in the title they would be bigger when I first opened them I thought it was a joke I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: dana may

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These have been great for my 18 month old! She loves stacking them and they are big enough for her to be able hold easily. I know she will love these as she grows. They have held up well against a toddler so far. Sge does (unfortunately) like to chew on things and these have so far withstood the few times I’m not quick enough to tell her no. Little teeth marks but they are not coming apart so that’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't consider these "giant" by any stretch of the imagination. But my grandkids are having a blast playing with therm.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love these blocks! They are a perfect size for my two year old-not too big and not too small. He loves stacking them and knocking them over, we use the arches as bridges over his railroad tracks, we make little houses with the shapes. It’s one of the things he plays with almost every single day. I keep them in a big basket so I can easily carry them up or downstairs, whenever he wants them. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cat T.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for houra
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 yrold love these he plays with them for hours, they stand up great to his roughness. They have been a great purchase. Keeps hom busy while I can get a few things done.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Children's block
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves to play with these! We have found many creative ways to use them to keep her amused for quite a while. She was about 13 months when she got them, and they are a favorite when she comes to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: These are fun
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are very versatile and fun. We have no worries of our 18 month old playing and knocking these blocks over. It is just fun for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kent R. Kieselbach

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love these blocks, and so do my grandchildren! I bought a set for them to play with at my house. They were such a hit, I bought another set for my 3 year old grandson’s birthday. Being made of foam, I don’t worry about accidental mishaps! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Edris Eileen Pike

customer_reviews.title: Fairly priced, and fun building blocks
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing to not love about these blocks! I bought these to keep my grandsons (1&3 years old)occupied and they have not disappointed! We have bristle blocks and traditional large legos...they prefer to play with these; not to mention they don't hurt if you happen to step on one! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha

customer_reviews.title: Safe Blocks for Young Kids
customer_reviews.text: My one year old grandson loves to knock down towers and these blocks are great. They are soft with no hard edges and no danger of him being hurt by falling blocks. He is already trying to stack them himself and will be building his own towers soon!
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: You can hand these down when your kid is through
customer_reviews.text: keep them away from gnawing pets, and these will live in your friendship circle forever. Easy to clean. Crazy durable—I spotted them in a public museum.
customer_reviews.author: faithful reader

customer_reviews.title: nice product. all the reviews are accurate
customer_reviews.text: nice product. all the reviews are accurate. child leaves faint bite marks but nothing can be chewed off. saw the same blocks at our library and they get a lot of abuse there. we will use these for many years. got a big laundry bag at walmart to store them in.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Great block set for little ones
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are great and th kids love them. All the building fun without the hard-sharp conrners.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My one year old grandson LOVES knocking these down! We've had hours of fun playing with this!
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Not giant
customer_reviews.text: Good blocks, but not giant. Even compared to regular size blocks. More of a medium/large split size.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great building blocks.
customer_reviews.text: Durable and sturdy! My children have always loved these blocks. I started buying them when my seven year old was one.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! Even for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to entertain small children at a birthday party since I was too late to rent party activities. The children LOVED them!
customer_reviews.author: Reh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are not giant like the description says. I wish I would’ve looked more at the pictures that were posted. I probably would’ve never paid $40 for this set. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as the pictures suggest but still good.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoys these blocks. They are a great size, perfect for an 18 mo to play with. The issue I had was simple QC. A few of the blocks had holes in or thru them, probably from air pockets when manufactured; it's a small thing but disappointing none the less. Overall I'd still buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great size for building
customer_reviews.text: Great size and light weight. Grandkids, ages 1 to 3, love them. They are showing some wear after about 6 months of regular use. Not sure how to clean them? Might try the dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette VonAllman

customer_reviews.title: Safe and fu
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old great grandson loves them. He can’t hurt himself and they fit in his bands
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Carle

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Good buy however shortly after the purchase I found it somewhere else online for cheaper. My daughter likes to build so it was still worth it
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers love these!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these jumbo blocks! I was worried when I saw other reviewers saying they were smaller than expected. The blocks we received were as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kendell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I was expecting. My son was instantly playing with his set as soon as he got them!
customer_reviews.author: Paiko 815

customer_reviews.title: The thickness is what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product. It is difficult to store it back in the zipper bag that it came in. I am using a laundry basket And that is working out well.
customer_reviews.author: HRM

customer_reviews.title: Fun play and affordable
customer_reviews.text: The kids I have and the kids I care for absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recieved these for her birthday. She just turned one. She loves these blocks!! They are big and soft and she loves to play with them! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Sandstedt

customer_reviews.title: easy for a toddler to hold and no danger in getting hurt if they threw them.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the giant foam blocks they are lightweight easy for a toddler to hold and no danger in getting hurt if they threw them.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Not giant at all!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not giant at all! It’s small size. In the picture you see as almost the size of a child!!! They are giant compared to an ant...
customer_reviews.author: BEATRIZ DO PRADO RODRIGUES

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these blocks for my grandchildren when they come to visit. They are a huge success. The children love them and they are very well made! They feel dense and strong. So far they are all enjoying them and their parents like getting down on the floor and playing with them too! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Ellen McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with grandkids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my five-year-old granddaughter for Christmas, not only does she love playing with them but her seven-year-old brother also what’s the building with them. I plan to buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for small kids.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson,he loves to build and knock them over. Large colorful,foam shapes in bright colors, he is 1 year old and loves playing with these.Would definetly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My little girls, 2 years old and 9 months old, love these! She’s always wanting to build and this allows her creativity to flourish. They are durable as my 9 month old likes to chew on the pieces and they don’t break off in her mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Safe fun play!
customer_reviews.text: These are colorful soft and varied shapes make play fun Bought for 2 year old grandson but older children enjoy playing with them
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr. old grandson likes to build w/ blocks & knocking them down, so this was even more fun building bigger buildings! Being foam makes that activity nice & quiet.
customer_reviews.author: ETF

customer_reviews.title: Fun building blocks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my grandsons aged 3 and 1. They are wonderful,just wish I had more!
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as being giant blocks but are pretty much the same size as normal wood blocks. Returning..
customer_reviews.author: Dredre726

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are great for kids1-5 or so. They love to build things and then knock them down! I’ve given them to three different boys and they all love them! They are big enough for them to handle, lightweight, and soft enough to not cause any problems. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Dan Baker

customer_reviews.title: Nice big blocks!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are great. My 2 year old loves them, we are getting a second pack. The four star review is due to the size that is reflected in the pictures, the blocks are not 4”x4”, they are a bit over 2”.
customer_reviews.author: kball

customer_reviews.title: non toxic blocks
customer_reviews.text: non toxic, lightweight for little hands, no chance of choking
customer_reviews.author: south1park1cows

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting chemical / fumes smell
customer_reviews.text: Nice size blocks & kids were so excited to play with them. Unfortunately, the strong chemical smell was overpowering. Couldn’t have my kids playing with these & my toddler possibly putting in his mouth. Go with another brand of blocks!
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toys.
customer_reviews.text: Its my own fault that I did not look closely at the details. I had expected the blocks to be much larger. Since they are not as large as I had hoped it would've been nice if there were more pieces included. Overall tho I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Rene

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these foam blocks for our 3 year old grandsons but, in truth, the whole family has enjoyed them. Well made, vibrant colors and assorted shapes in great sizes make this a super product. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: LAMRC

customer_reviews.title: Fun for toddlers and preschool.
customer_reviews.text: Colorful, variety of shapes that can be used for teaching in addition to play.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: ... a little bit misleading but this block set is great! They are larger than your typical foam block ...
customer_reviews.text: The word giant is a little bit misleading but this block set is great! They are larger than your typical foam block set. Great for the price. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are not as big as they appear in the catalog...
customer_reviews.text: When we saw the picture and read the word "giant" we thought the blocks would be much larger. It was a disappointment that they were that small. I instantly regretted buying two of these and am considering returning one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Size is not as promoted. Pieces are suppose to be 4 inches and these are 2 1/2. Not jumbo by any means. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Zareczny

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a product my friend had. However, they are much smaller than the set she got for the same price. These are not giant as described.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M Burns Rozycki

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy! My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy! My kids love it. There are lots of pieces and options. My only complaint is that i think it is a little expensive for for a foam toy.
customer_reviews.author: kzkapow

customer_reviews.title: A Hit With All Ages
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded our expectations. We had only wooden blocks at our church kids care for all ages. Too noisy, not safe for toddlers. All ages love these building blocks. Light, durable, they make magical constructions, also get thrown around. Safe in a free for all. The adults are tempted to play too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe toy for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old and my 8 year old playing with it all the time too.. it's safe and some much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: I was highly disappointed when I received them and they are only a ...
customer_reviews.text: Why you advertise GIANT I assume the are giant. I was highly disappointed when I received them and they are only a few inches by a few inches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. Perfect size. My son loves them. Easy to fit back into zippered bag too. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: BC

product_meta.title: Giant Foam Building Blocks, Building Toy for Girls and Boys, Ideal Blocks Construction Toys for Toddlers, 50 Pieces Different Shapes and Sizes, Waterproof, Bright Colors, Safe, Non Toxic
product_meta.description:
Are you looking for a toy/game that is more engaging and requires more activity 
on your baby’s part rather than just a sit and watch entertainment toy?

Are you looking for a stack and build toy/game but want to have building blocks 
which are more softer in touch, comfortable to hold and easy to clean?

Congratulations! You have landed to the right page. Our kids blocks are a perfect solution to your needs
and you will love them for their many incredible features and benefits: 

- Set of 50 jumbo (21.3" x 9.6") foam blocks – they come in different colors and varied shapes
- Made up of non-toxic and non-allergic materials 
- Safe for toddlers – sized to pose no choking hazard
- Stimulate creativity, logical thinking and problem-solving skills
- Easy to clean when bathing the baby – helps maintain high level of hygiene
- A construction toy that helps create precious memories for your baby
- Helps in development of motoring skills as it requires hands and fingers muscles movement
- Helps in understanding spatial relationship between building blocks and learn about basic shapes
- Open-ended toys offer limitless possibilities and keep your baby interested even when she grows
- Stacking the blocks, building a structure and knocking it down is surely too much fun for babies
- Can keep your baby entertained and engaged for hours – thus giving you sufficient time for routine activities

MAKE IT THE PERFECT GIFT

Don’t get frustrated while searching the right toy gift for you lovely child or grandchild, 
get her this high quality Foam Blocks Set as a gift she/he will remember their entire life!

So, why think twice?

ORDER NOW and get these incredible foam building blocks for your children to keep them entertained and to help in her overall development!
feature_bullets: STIMULATE YOUR CHILD’S IMAGINATION: Our Giant (21.3" x 9.6") set of 50 pcs colored foam blocks come in 6 different colors and many different shapes thus giving your child endless possibilities to create different shapes and forms. The numerous possibilities also help stimulate your child’s creativity and encourage exploration and problem solving.

SIMULTANEOUS ENTERTAINMENT AND DEVELOPMENT: These foam building blocks not only help keep your baby engaged and entertained for hours but also help in the development of their cognitive abilities (requires logical thinking), motoring skills (requires hands and fingers muscle movement), and language skills (can learn basic shape terminologies, orientations, etc.)

SAFE AND COMFORTABLE TO HOLD: Our foam building blocks for toddlers are sized such that they do not pose any risks of chocking. Moreover, all the foam blocks are made up of non-toxic and comfortable to touch material that is ideal for your baby’s sensitive skin. These open-ended toys are capable of keeping your baby entertained even when she grows – as the level of difficulty can easily go up from low to high.

HYGIENIC: All the building blocks are waterproof and can be simply washed when bathing the baby – this helps you maintain high level of hygiene and keep your baby in a healthier surroundings. A baby occupied for long hours means enough time for you to finish your activities without worrying too much about the baby.

100% RISK-FREE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We also offer you 100% Risk-Free Satisfaction Guarantee to let you buy with confidence; no questions asked. However, we are quite sure that you will be super impressed with these foam blocks as they allow for enough room for creativity, keep your baby entertained and help in overall development.
